entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
